Split training.name: Seated Forward Fold
Split training.description: Sit with legs extended and reach towards your feet.

Split training.name: Half Split Stretch
Split training.description: One leg extended, one leg bent; lean forward for a deep stretch.

Split training.name: Full Front Split
Split training.description: Gradually slide into a full front split.

Split training.name: Frog Stretch
Split training.description: Knees wide apart, sit back to stretch the inner thighs.

Split training.name: Butterfly Stretch
Split training.description: Sit with the soles of your feet together and press your knees towards the ground.

Split training.name: Lying Straddle Stretch
Split training.description: Lie on your back and extend your legs wide, letting gravity stretch them.

Split training.name: Standing Side Lunge Stretch
Split training.description: Lean to one side while keeping the other leg extended for an inner thigh stretch.

Split training.name: Seated Straddle Stretch
Split training.description: Sit with your legs wide apart and lean forward for a deep hamstring and hip stretch.

Split training.name: Wall Straddle Stretch
Split training.description: Lie on your back against a wall and let your legs gradually slide into a straddle split.

Split training.name: Deep Lunge Stretch
Split training.description: Step one foot forward and sink into a deep lunge to open up the hip flexors.

Split training.name: Pigeon Pose
Split training.description: Bring one leg forward and extend the other backward to stretch the hips and glutes.

Split training.name: Standing Forward Fold
Split training.description: Stand and fold forward, reaching for your toes while keeping legs straight.

Split training.name: Side Split (Middle Split)
Split training.description: Gradually slide both legs apart until achieving a full side split.

Split training.name: Elevated Front Split
Split training.description: Place your front leg on an elevated surface and stretch deeper into the front split.

Split training.name: Active Split Hold
Split training.description: Engage muscles to hold a split position without relying on the ground for support.

Split training.name: Dynamic Front Split Pulses
Split training.description: Move gently in and out of a front split position to increase flexibility dynamically.

Split training.name: Wall-Assisted Front Split
Split training.description: Use a wall to support and deepen your front split stretch.

Split training.name: Leg Swings
Split training.description: Swing one leg forward and backward to loosen up the hip flexors.

Split training.name: Hip Circles
Split training.description: Stand and move your hips in circular motions to increase mobility.

Split training.name: Butt Kicks
Split training.description: Run in place while kicking your heels toward your glutes.

Split training.name: Lateral Leg Swings
Split training.description: Swing one leg side to side to loosen up the hip joints.

Split training.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
Split training.description: Arch and round your back to mobilize the spine before stretching.
